description: Detects execution of "odbcconf" with the "-f" flag in order to load a response file which might contain a malicious action.
author: Kirill Kiryanov
Beyu Denis
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
oscd.community
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: The rule is looking for any usage of response file, which might generate false positive when this function is used legitimately. Investigate the contents of the ".rsp" file to determine if it is malicious and apply additional filters if necessary.
name: Response File Execution Via Odbcconf.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\odbcconf.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"odbcconf.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \-f\ *" OR "*\ \/f\ *") AND process.command_line.text:"*.rsp*")
